TestDescription.name: Microsoft Office possible sensitive information

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: This document has been converted to HTML using Microsoft Office. It seems that Office has included sensitive information during the conversion.
TestDescription.Impact: Possible sensitive information disclosure that may help an attacker to conduct social engineering attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Inspect the source code of this document and remove the sensitive information.
